chartbeat.title: NCAAM College Basketball Scores - NCAAM Scoreboard - ESPN

content.description: Real-time NCAAM College Basketball scores on ESPN
content.keywords: NCAAM Scores, NCAAM scoreboard, College Basketball Scores, College Basketball scoreboard

headlines.description: De'Riante Jenkins and Justin Tillman scored 18 points apiece and VCU took control in the second half to defeat George Washington 87-63 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jenkins, Tillman score 18, lead VCU past GW 87-63

headlines.description: Lavone Holland II scored 16 points, including a pair of baskets that blunted a Green Bay rally, and Northern Kentucky beat the Phoenix 77-65 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Northern Kentucky turns away Green Bay 77-65

headlines.description: Jordan Burns scored 20 points and Dana Batt made all seven of his shots and scored 16 and Colgate beat Loyola (MD) 77-72 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Colgate pulls away late from Loyola (MD) in 77-72 win

headlines.description: D'Marcus Simonds had 24 points and 10 rebounds to lead Georgia State to an 83-66 victory over rival Georgia Southern on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Simonds leads Georgia State over rival 83-66

headlines.description: Brandon Better scored 13 points with four 3-pointers, Jamal Aytes added 11 points and Southern Utah beat Eastern Washington 66-62 in overtime on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: S Utah edges E Washington 66-62 in OT

headlines.description: Jordan Blount scored 17 points and grabbed 11 rebounds to lead Illinois-Chicago to an 87-80 win over Cleveland State on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: UIC hangs on for 87-80 win over Cleveland State

headlines.description: Freshman Eric Williams Jr. poured in a career-high 34 points, hitting 9 of 15 from 3-point range, and grabbed 11 rebounds for his third straight double-double and ninth of the season as Duquesne held off George Mason 95-89 in double overtime on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Duquesne edges George Mason in double OT thriller

headlines.description: Amidou Bamba tipped in a missed jumper by Jaylen Shaw to give Coastal Carolina a two-point lead with under two minutes left and the Chanticleers made it hold up for a 74-73 comeback win over Troy in a Sun Belt Conference battle Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Coastal Carolina stages a comeback to beat Troy, 74-73

headlines.description: Zach Lofton made seven 3-pointers and scored 24 points and New Mexico State defeated Utah Valley 86-59 on Saturday to win its fifth straight and take sole possession of first place in the Western Athletic Conference.
headlines.shortLinkText: New Mexico State wins 86-59, now alone atop WAC

headlines.description: Zach Sellers hit two key free throws with 11 seconds left and Javaris Jenkins added a third four seconds later as Savannah State held on win its fourth Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference game in four starts, topping Hampton 103-101 Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Savannah State holds off Hampton from the line, wins 103-101

headlines.description: Tre'Shaun Fletcher had his eighth double-double of the season, including seven points in the final four minutes, and Luke Knapke had 16 points and nine rebounds to help Toledo beat Kent State 72-65 on Saturday night for its fifth win in a row.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fletcher scores 17 with 12 boards, Toledo beats Kent State

headlines.description: Jacobi Boykins scored 21 points with six 3-pointers, Jy'lan Washington added 13 points, and Louisiana Tech beat Rice 69-54 on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Boykin scores 21, Louisiana Tech beats Rice 69-54

headlines.description: Alessandro Lever finished with 24 points and 10 rebounds for his first career double-double and Grand Canyon cruised to an 86-69 victory over Missouri-Kansas City on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lever's double-double powers Grand Canyon past UMKC 86-69

headlines.description: Alan Herndon scored 21 points, Hayden Dalton added 20 more and Wyoming held off a Utah State rally Saturday night for an 85-77 win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wyoming holds off Utah State in 85-77 win

headlines.description: Frankie Ferrari had 22 points and six assists, and San Francisco beat Pepperdine 80-73 on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ferrari scores 22; San Francisco beats Pepperdine 80-73

content.title: NCAAM College Basketball Scores - NCAAM Scoreboard - ESPN

nowFeed.headline: Marvin Bagley III is out again for Duke tomorrow. Will be his third straight missed game.
nowFeed.story: Marvin Bagley III is out again for Duke tomorrow. Will be his third straight missed game.

nowFeed.headline: Northwestern scores 11 second-half points and blows a 27-point lead to fall to Michigan State, 65-60. Wildcats missed 17 straight shots at one point.
nowFeed.story: Northwestern scores 11 second-half points and blows a 27-point lead to fall to Michigan State, 65-60. Wildcats missed 17 straight shots at one point.

nowFeed.headline: Kentucky's four-game losing streak is over as the it beats Alabama, 81-71, at home. It wasn't always pretty, but the Wildcats dominated the boards, out-rebounding the Tide by 17. Turnovers down the stretch doomed Alabama                                                                          .
nowFeed.story: Kentucky's four-game losing streak is over as the it beats Alabama, 81-71, at home. It wasn't always pretty, but the Wildcats dominated the boards, out-rebounding the Tide by 17. Turnovers down the stretch doomed Alabama                                                                          .

nowFeed.headline: Will Wade coming out in an aggressive 1-3-1 zone out of back-to-back timeouts late against Missouri worked to perfection. Tremont Waters and LSU escape, snapping Mizzou's five-game wining streak.
nowFeed.story: Will Wade coming out in an aggressive 1-3-1 zone out of back-to-back timeouts late against Missouri worked to perfection. Tremont Waters and LSU escape, snapping Mizzou's five-game wining streak.

nowFeed.headline: It's amazing that Kentucky is +17 rebounding yet is leading Alabama by just 2 points with under 8 minutes remaining. The Wildcats have missed some point-blank shots this afternoon.
nowFeed.story: It's amazing that Kentucky is +17 rebounding yet is leading Alabama by just 2 points with under 8 minutes remaining. The Wildcats have missed some point-blank shots this afternoon.

nowFeed.headline: Alabama big man Donta Hall may be wearing two different shoes (one white, one crimson), but he's playing very good basketball. He's 7 of 8 from the field and a big reason why the Tide have the lead over Kentucky with under 9 minutes to play.
nowFeed.story: Alabama big man Donta Hall may be wearing two different shoes (one white, one crimson), but he's playing very good basketball. He's 7 of 8 from the field and a big reason why the Tide have the lead over Kentucky with under 9 minutes to play.

nowFeed.headline: Oklahoma's Trae Young, on his recent offensive struggles: "I’m getting guarded like nobody else in the country is being guarded, scouted on like no one else in the country. It’s a mystery coming out each and every game to try and figure out how a team is going to guard me and how I’m going to dictate how my team wins. … It’s a lot tougher for me to score now than it was in the beginning. ... It’s a process. Right now, it’s tough."
nowFeed.story: Oklahoma's Trae Young, on his recent offensive struggles: "I’m getting guarded like nobody else in the country is being guarded, scouted on like no one else in the country. It’s a mystery coming out each and every game to try and figure out how a team is going to guard me and how I’m going to dictate how my team wins. … It’s a lot tougher for me to score now than it was in the beginning. ... It’s a process. Right now, it’s tough."

nowFeed.headline: .@NUMensBball crushing Michigan State. Best performance in Rosemont Horizon  (Allstate Arena) since Aguirre & Cummings.
nowFeed.story: .@NUMensBball crushing Michigan State. Best performance in Rosemont Horizon (Allstate Arena) since Aguirre & Cummings.

Northwestern lost to Rutgers four days ago.

Northwestern is up 22 at halftime on Michigan State right now.
nowFeed.story:

nowFeed.headline: Collin Sexton has returned from the locker room with a bandage on his chin. Alabama's leading scorer took a hard fall on the court earlier and went straight to the locker room. He's now back on the court against Kentucky.
nowFeed.story: Collin Sexton has returned from the locker room with a bandage on his chin. Alabama's leading scorer took a hard fall on the court earlier and went straight to the locker room. He's now back on the court against Kentucky.

nowFeed.headline: Collin Sexton fell and smashed the side of his face on the court after a drive to the basket. He was slow getting up and when he did, he went straight to the locker room. He's Alabama's best scoring option.
nowFeed.story: Collin Sexton fell and smashed the side of his face on the court after a drive to the basket. He was slow getting up and when he did, he went straight to the locker room. He's Alabama's best scoring option.

nowFeed.headline: One of the cool things about calling a game at Georgia Tech is being setup by the visiting team's bench. Usually we are across the floor, and don't get to see into the huddle like this.
nowFeed.story: One of the cool things about calling a game at Georgia Tech is being setup by the visiting team's bench. Usually we are across the floor, and don't get to see into the huddle like this.

nowFeed.headline: South Carolina guard Kory Holden is leaving the program. Former Delaware transfer scored just 47 points in 14 games this season after averaging 17.7 at Delaware.
nowFeed.story: South Carolina guard Kory Holden is leaving the program. Former Delaware transfer scored just 47 points in 14 games this season after averaging 17.7 at Delaware.

nowFeed.headline: Not a good sign for Alabama when big man Donta Hall heads to the locker room early against Kentucky after appearing to aggravate his already injured wrist. The Tide need his ability to protect the rim against the Wildcats, who want to make a living in the paint.
nowFeed.story: Not a good sign for Alabama when big man Donta Hall heads to the locker room early against Kentucky after appearing to aggravate his already injured wrist. The Tide need his ability to protect the rim against the Wildcats, who want to make a living in the paint.

nowFeed.headline: Key road win for Syracuse at Miami. Orange are squarely on the bubble, but hold their Selection Sunday destiny in their hands. Final four games: vs. UNC, at Duke, at BC, vs. Clemson. They'll have their chances down the stretch.
nowFeed.story: Key road win for Syracuse at Miami. Orange are squarely on the bubble, but hold their Selection Sunday destiny in their hands. Final four games: vs. UNC, at Duke, at BC, vs. Clemson. They'll have their chances down the stretch.

nowFeed.headline: Oklahoma has now lost five in a row and eight of its last 10 games — with a road game at Kansas coming on Monday.
nowFeed.story: Oklahoma has now lost five in a row and eight of its last 10 games — with a road game at Kansas coming on Monday.

nowFeed.headline: Oklahoma is not a bubble team yet. But following a fifth straight loss, Trae Young and the Sooners are watching their NCAA Tournament seed plummet.
nowFeed.story: Oklahoma is not a bubble team yet. But following a fifth straight loss, Trae Young and the Sooners are watching their NCAA Tournament seed plummet.

nowFeed.headline: Vanderbilt used a little Memorial Magic to beat Mississippi State last week. We tried to recreate Riley LaChance's game winner today. ‘Dores host Florida 4:00 ET on eapn2.
